project.name: Organic cosmetcs packaging
project.info: This is a design for the packaging of an extremely natural organic face cream where the main accent falls on the picturesque pattern of drawn freezes representing the uniqueness of the product. The black background links the box with the contained black glass bottle inside and creates a luxury sensation. Jiade Organic Cosmetics were our first clients and it was a real pleasure to create their first packaging!

project.name: Packaging of herbal aromatic pouches
project.info: These are functional boxes with an original opening to a beautiful detail form the product inside. To add to the handmade image, sense of history and home cosiness we chose a toned cardboard and light drawings of the herbs.

project.name: Eau de toilette label series
project.info: Bright colours and a light drawing on small metal bottles – a pure scent from the nature for the young city people.

project.name: Printed advertising materials for a small bakery
project.info: Anastasia‘s pastry is extremely beautiful as well as spreading pure joy, that is why she chose to have on her visit card a childish like drawing of a cake.

project.name: Visit cards and catalogues
project.info: This is a gallery of selected visit cards and catalogues for various people and businesses. We aim to an individual approach in every project. Our designs combine the expression of what is most essential for our client with a high quality realization.

project.name: Posters
project.info: This is a collection of various posters: advertising, promotional or theatre posters. In the process of creating a poster we feel free to follow our artistic explorations and keep the functionality at the same time.
project.client:
Frida Dance Company
Lili Videnova – theater director,
Jiade organic Cosmetics

project.name: Calendars
project.info: Wall or table calendars – lets mark the passing time with beautiful pictures which bring joy to the eye and confirm our moments of success.

about.bio:
Manitza Ltd is founded in 2008 in Plovdiv, Bulgaria. Packagind design, graphic and print design are part of our activities.

Our goal is to satisfy our clients‘ needs by creating products of proven aesthetic quality. Our projects are functional and communicative as well as original and beautiful. We feel responsible to add to the overall beauty and harmony in the everyday life and to raise good taste.

The company designer is Elena Kalpakchieva, a graduate of the National Academy of Arts and with over 6 years of experience in the field of graphic design. Apar form her work as a designer, you can see her paintings here: flickr
